version_description:
• No longer selects automatically the next tab when closing a tab
• Added an agent spoofing option
• Fixed a bug where the « Set Homepage » button would always be disabled
• Fixed a bug where whitelisted cookies were deleted
• Fixed various bugs in the setting page

• Added contextual options to the long press menu : open in a new tab, copy link, save image…
• Added non-blocking messages to send feedback to the user on background tasks.
• Improved error handling: errors are now displayed directly in the web view.
• Tweaked the tab selection page.
• Fixed a bug where the progress bar would appear event though the content finished loading.

Features:
• Added a two-finger gesture to change tab without going through the tabs selection page.
• Added iOS 7 support: now bringing privacy to even more users!
• Added a "content policy" setting, which allows, among other things, disabling javascript.
• Added the option to reopen tabs when the app is launched.
• Added "HTTPS Everywhere", which makes browsing more secure by encrypting your communications.
• Added a tutorial when launching the app.

User interface:
• Added a night-mode to the app: everything becomes darker!
• Added French localization.
• Nicer SSL certificates management with a padlock button to display the certificate.
• Numerous tweaks to improve the user experience.

Miscellaneous:
• Fixed an issue where the "auto-negotiate" setting for SSL/TLS version would just use the latest version.
• Updated Tor and SSL.
• Bug fixes.

Major rewrite to thank the 100,000 users who download Tob so far!

User interface improvements:
• Increased webpages' viewing space for better browsing experience;
• Improved settings for greater convenience;
• Changed Tor loading page on startup;
• Improved non-intrusive notifications;
• Dedicated Tor panel to facilitate advanced features for non Tor experts;
• Many minor refinements.

Security:
• Made security settings more explicite;
• Added more understandable explanations of settings;
• Adjusted settings to allow more captchas to work.

Miscellaneous:
• Bug fixes;
• Stability and performance improvements.

iOS 7 tests still under progress, expect a release soon…

• Added a Tor log (accessible while loading or from the Tor panel)
• Added a button to download & open PDFs in other apps
• Added support for bridges with Pluggable Transports
• Added built-in bridges for easier access
• Added settings related to IPv6 and improved compatibility with IPv6
• Added a button to manually clear cookies in the settings (cache and cookies are, and have always been, automatically deleted when the user closes the app)
• Added a setting to hide the app screen when it enters the background
• Improved URL detection in search/URL field
• Tweaked translations
• Multiple bug fixes

Thank you for using Tob; if you enjoy this app, please consider rating it on the AppStore!

• Added more search engines
• Updated default bridges
• Updated Tor and other dependencies
• Fixed a crash when trying to save a photo to the library
• Minor visual tweaks and bug fixes

• Added shortcuts when scrolling at the top (refresh, close tab, new tab)
• Added button to view built Tor circuits from the Tor panel
• Improved URL detection and use of search engines with JavaScript disabled
• Fixed crash on devices using iOS 11
• Fixed issues with IPv6 only networks
• Improved browsing experience when searching from the navigation bar
• Minor visual tweaks and bug fixes

• Added a content blocker: save bandwidth & browse faster without ads
• Drastically improved scrolling when selecting tabs
• Improved progress estimation while loading pages
• Improved error display when web pages fail to load
• Minor visual tweaks and bug fixes

• Added shortcuts when scrolling at the top (refresh, close tab, new tab)
• Added button to view built Tor circuits from the Tor panel
• Improved URL detection and use of search engines with JavaScript disabled
• Fixed crash on devices using iOS 11
• Fixed issues with IPv6 only networks
• Improved browsing experience when searching from the navigation bar
• Minor visual tweaks and bug fixes
Bug fixes and minor improvements
Bug fixing & dependencies update

• Dependencies update
• Various bug fixes and improvements

• Updated dependencies
• Improved connection failure handling
• Various bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixing & dependencies update

• Improved compatibility with OS darkmode,
• Updated default bridges,
• Updated dependencies,
• Bug fixes.
Performance improvements.
